products.title: DRAGONFLY SKATEBOARD DECK
products.description: A medium concave deck made of seven layers of 100% Canadian maple wood. The graphic is made by Goan artist ‘Malcolm Rebello’. The board is available in different sizes. A guide is provided below to help you pick your first board but it is not necessary to follow it strictly.

products.title: PISO LOGO SKATEBOARD DECK
products.description: A medium concave deck made of seven layers of 100% Canadian maple wood. The board is available in different sizes. A guide is provided below to help you pick your first board but it is not necessary to follow it strictly.

products.title: FLYIN MUNKI SKATEBOARD DECK
products.description: A medium concave deck made of seven layers of 100% Canadian maplewood. The graphic is made by Goan graffiti artist ‘Flyin Munki’. The board is available in different sizes. A guide is provided below to help you pick your first board but it is not necessary to follow it strictly. Over a period of time every skateboarder has his/her own preference of deck size, many times irrespective of foot size.

products.title: NAMASKATE SKATEBOARD DECK
products.description: A medium concave deck made of seven layers of 100% Canadian maple wood. The graphic is made by Goan artist ‘Malcolm Rebello’. The board is available in different sizes. A guide is provided below to help you pick your first board but it is not necessary to follow it strictly.

products.title: MANDALA SKATEBOARD DECK
products.description: A medium concave deck made of seven layers of 100% Canadian maplewood. The graphic is made by the artist 'Joshua Kennedy'. The board is available in different sizes. A guide is provided below to help you pick your first board but it is not necessary to follow it strictly. Over a period of time every skateboarder has his/her own preference of deck size, many times irrespective of foot size

products.title: T TOOL
products.description: One tool that multi tasks to loosen or tighten every nut and bolt in your setup. This T-tool will adjust your kingpin, axle nuts and your hardware, and also has Phillips and Allen screw driver heads. It is very handy and easy to use anytime you need to change wheels, bearings or just tighten/loosen your trucks.

products.title: CRUISER WHEELS 58MM (83A)
products.description: This is the Perfect Cruiser Wheel for the Indian streets. The diameter of this wheel is 58mm and the hardness is 83A. It has round edge on outside for better durability.  Say no to the vibrations! and enjoy the softer ride :). This wheel is specifically designed for cruising so doing tricks will be a bit harder, and due to lower softness it will be tough to power slide.

products.title: MIZO SKATE WAX
products.description: Mizo skatewax is finally available in our store, hailing all the way from Mizoram. This wax is guaranteed to make your slides smoother and much more in control. Just rub the bar generously under the board, or on the ledge or rail you want to grind or slide on. Grab one before it gets sold out!

products.title: PISO SKATEBAGPACK
products.description: Every skater likes to carry their board along with them everywhere. But sometimes when you are travelling, you’ll be wishing you had a bag for your board, your tools and extras (specially during airport check ins). Here’s our answer to that for you. A bag that holds easily one complete and a few extra decks with still some room to spare for smaller kits. It has a long zipper pocket in the front and an open elastic bottle holder on one side. The bags are hand stitched and designed by skateboarders, so their ruggedness and durability are well assured.

products.title: SKATE BAG (FOLDABLE)
products.description: A compact and pocket friendly alternative for travelling with your skateboard. This bag is light weight and rolls up when not in use. It comes in a Grey and  Dark navy blue shade. It can fit in one full skateboard complete plus few decks and other stuff. It is made keeping in mind the ruggedness and durability a skateboarder would require and measures 39cm x 90 cm. Seems to us like the perfect one.

products.title: SKATEBOARD WHEELS 54MM/52MM (100A)
products.description: A set of 4 polyurethane wheels of 100A hardness that are ideal for an overall skating experience. Not too hard for the Indian roads so you have smooth ride, but at the same time hard enough to ensure you have nice powerslides. The wheels are available in two sizes. The preferred 54mm and the 52mm that get’s picked up mostly by skaters who prefer skating street more than to parks and bowls.

products.title: CRUISER WHEELS 58MM (83A)
products.description: This is the Perfect Cruiser Wheel for the Indian streets. The diameter of this wheel is 58mm and the hardness is 83A. It has round edge on outside for better durability.  Say no to the vibrations! and enjoy the softer ride :). This wheel is specifically designed for cruising so doing tricks will be a bit harder, and due to lower softness it will be tough to power slide.

products.title: CONICAL SKATEBOARD WHEELS 56MM (100A)
products.description: A set of 4 polyurethane conical shaped skateboarding wheels of 100A hardness that are ideal for Park and Bowls style skating. The wheels are available in 56mm size. Its the best sweet spot if you skate streets and you have a skatepark in your area with a Bowl.

products.title: DRAGONFLY SKATEBOARD COMPLETE
products.description: The perfect skateboard for any and every beginner who is looking to pickup a new complete skateboard setup.The complete setup consists of a medium concave deck made of seven layers of 100% Canadian maplewood available in different sizes, a set of 54mm wheels of 100A hardness, a pair of trucks, 1” hardware, a set of eight bearings and grip tape. The skateboards are delivered pre-assembled.
